data.name: Adept Movements
data.description: Graceful strike will cause the target to have 50% slower auto attack speed. You will gain 50% auto attack speed for the duration.

data.name: Aethyric Dissipation
data.description: Dazzling strike will now deal its damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of the target.

data.name: Aethyric Grasp
data.description: Roots up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of you, making them unable to move for 5 seconds. Root has a 50% chance to break whenever hit.

data.name: Balanced Accuracy
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% for 6 seconds after using a Perfect Balance ability.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to elemental resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to corporeal and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Bladeshield
data.description: You become protected by a magical shell for a few moments which will strike back at any attacker for 300 + 0.6STR spiritual damage for 15 seconds.

data.name: Blurring Shock
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: A powerful slash that deals X spirit damage. For the next 15 seconds, each time the target is critically hit, they take an additional Y spirit damage.

data.name: Bolstering Enchantments
data.description: Whenever Heaven's Blade, Phantom's Blade, or Nature's Blade triggers you will restore X health immediately and Y health over 10 seconds to groupmates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Calming Winds
data.description: Increase disrupt and dodge chance by 15% for 6 seconds after using a Perfect Balance ability.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional X spiritual damage over 3 seconds. This damage scales with strength, ballistic skill, and intelligence.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge up to 9 opponents 65 feet in front of you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Crashing Wave
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: You launch two powerful blows dealing a total of X spiritual damage and knocking your opponent down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Crushing Advance
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires Shield
data.description: A calculated shield maneuver that inflicts X physical damage to up to 9 enemies within 25 feet in front of you. Additionally, for the next 20 seconds, groupmates within 100 feet have their block rate increased by 5% and gain a Y unique bonus to armor.

data.name: Dazzling Strike
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: When your blade hits your opponent it releases a blinding flash of light that deals X spiritual damage, and disorients your target for 5 seconds, increasing their build times by 50%.

data.name: Deep Incision
data.description: Quick Incision will now inflict an additional X spiritual damage over 8 seconds.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that causes target to take a 1200 morale penalty to armor and deals 600 + 1.5 STR physical damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Gain a 10% tactic bonus to parry strikethrough, dodge strikethrough, and disrupt strikethrough.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you, reducing their damage dealt by 50% for 7 seconds.

data.name: Diverse Footing
data.description: Increases the durations of Graceful Strike, Eagle's Flight, and Dragon's Talons to 10 seconds.

data.name: Dragon's Talon
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You release two rending blows that deal X spiritual damage each, crippling your target for 5 seconds, reducing the damage they deal with every attack to 80%.

data.name: Eagle's Flight
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A guarded strike that deals X physical damage and improves your chance to parry by 25% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Ensorcelled Agony
data.description: Ensorcelled Blow will now cause an additional X spiritual damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Ensorcelled Blow
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A quick precision slash that calls out the enchantment in your blade dealing X spiritual damage.

data.name: Ether Dance
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You focus on your target, slashing repeatedly for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to seven times and dealing X spiritual damage with each hit.

data.name: Rush
data.description: You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 25% for 8 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 8 seconds have passed.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: Taunt will now apply 10 stacks to the target.

data.name: Graceful Strike
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A swift attack that deals X physical damage over 5 seconds. Damage from this ability will generate double threat in NPCs.

data.name: Great Weapon Mastery
data.description: When you are wielding a greatweapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: Gryphon's Lash
data.note: Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A fierce attack that deals X physical damage and cannot be blocked or parried.

data.name: Guard
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.

data.name: Guard of Steel
data.description: Remove up to 6 ailments, curses, and hexes from target groupmate. They will be healed for 200 for each effect removed.

data.name: Gusting Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You execute a quick spin, rending the air around you and producing a magical shockwave that which deals X spiritual damage to up to 9 opponents within 30 feet of you, knocking back enemy players and knocking down NPCs.

data.name: Heaven's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of the heavens. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance that your target takes X spiritual damage. For the next 5 seconds, the next hit the target receives from any source will automatically be a critical hit.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Hoeth's Tempering
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: An enchantment which calls upon the power of Hoeth, rendering your target silenced, unable to use magic for 4 seconds. Target will take X spiritual damage at the end of this effect.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: While channeling, you will mark up to 48 enemies 65 feet in front of you and up to 9 allies 65 feet behind you. Enemies that are marked will deal 50% less area of effect damage to allies that are marked. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain 25 stacks of immaculate defense for 20 seconds. Each stack grants 3% damage reduction. A stack is removed each time a target takes direct damage, and 5 stacks are removed if the target takes single target damage.

data.name: Impeccable Reactions
data.description: Each time you parry an attack, you will gain 100% parry for 5 seconds which is removed when you parry. This double parry can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Intimidating Blow
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: An overpowering strike that deals X physical damage and causes your target to lose 10 morale per second for 10s.

data.name: Isha's Protection
data.description: Heals are 20% more effective on you.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Lingering Intimidation
data.description: Intimidating Blow will now reduce your target's chance to critically hit by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Nature's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of nature. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal (3 * rank) ability penalty of one stat except wounds from up to 9 targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will gain an ability bonus to that stat.

You may have one Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Perfect Defenses
data.description: Increase block and parry chances by 8% for 6 seconds after using a Perfect Balance ability.

data.name: Phantom's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirits of the dead. All your melee attacks have a 25% chance to cause group members within 100 feet to absorb X damage over 10 seconds.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Phoenix's Wing
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A broad slash dealing X spiritual damage that hits up to 9 opponents in front of you, up to 25 feet away. Damage from this ability will generate double threat in NPCs.

data.name: Poised Attacks
data.description: You will gain 30 action points whenever a Heaven's Blade, Phantom's Blade, or Nature's Blade triggers. This effect cannot happen more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Potent Enchantments
data.description: Heaven's Blade, Phantom's Blade, and Nature's Blade will deal X physical damage over 9 seconds to the target that triggers them. This effect cannot refresh.

data.name: Protection of Vaul
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: You call upon the magic in your blade to form a barrier to protect you and any groupmates within 80 feet of you, absorbing up to X damage for up to 10 seconds

data.name: Quick Incision
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A rapid slash to your opponents legs that deals X physical damage and snares them by 30% for 8 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: For the next 7 seconds, up to 48 enemies within 65 feet frontal cone will take a 800 morale penalty to armor and a 300 morale penalty to all resistances. This effect can stack up to 3 times per target.

data.name: Redirected Force
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: Deals X physical damage. For the next 10 seconds, you will gain a (rank * 5) ability bonus to willpower. In addition, whenever you defend against an attack, you will deal Y spiritual damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to toughness.

data.name: Sapping Strike
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A targeted strike that saps the energy from your target dealing X spiritual damage and causing your target to use 50% more action points on abilities for 8 seconds.

data.name: Shadow Blades
data.description: Target enemy takes a (rank * 7.5) morale penalty to spiritual resistance and loses 10 morale per second for 30 seconds.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one enchantment from your enemy and do X physical damage.

data.name: Shield of Valor
data.description: Groupmates within 100 feet are protected by a magical barrier for 30 seconds which will absorb up to 4500 damage.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain a 40% increased chance to block and a 25% increased chance to parry, dodge, and disrupt for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

data.name: Sudden Shift
data.note: This ability does not trigger the GCD
data.description:
With a graceful sweep, you quickly change your stance and prepare for battle.

No Balance: You gain Improved Balance.
Improved Balance: You gain Perfect Balance.
Perfect Balance: You gain Improved Balance.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Throw
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X physical damage. Has a chance to deal Y physical damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Vaul's Buffer
data.description: On a successful block, parry, dodge or disrupt you will absorb up to X damage over the next 10 seconds. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds, but can stack up to 3 times.

data.name: Wall of Darting Steel
data.note: Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You spin your greatsword with astounding speed forming a wall of steel between you and your opponent. Increasing your chance to dodge, disrupt and parry attacks by 50%.

data.name: Whirling Geyser
data.description: Up to 48 enemies within 40 feet are knocked high into the air.

data.name: Whispering Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You release two swift blows that deal X spiritual damage each to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet. The winds then aid group members within 100 feet for the next 10 seconds by decreasing the cooldown of abilities used by 5 seconds.

data.name: Wings of Heaven
data.description: You magically leap through the air towards your target. When you land, up to 9 enemies around you will become snared for 10 seconds, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Wrath of Hoeth
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: The magic from your blade is released in a staggering explosion that deals X spiritual damage to up to 9 opponents within 30 feet. In addition your targets take a X ability penalty to spirit resistance for 20 seconds.
